alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tippah; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Tippah, west central Tishomingo, northern Prentiss and southeastern Alcorn Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hinkle to near Jumpertown to 8 miles southeast of Ripley. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Burnsville, Jumpertown, Glen, Thrashers, Hinkle, Leedy, Dumas, Rienzi, Kossuth, Allentown, Hightown, Biggersville, Blackland, Jobes, Gaston, Hazard Switch, Walker Siding, Holcut and Holts Spur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
